p: A unique compound, a 3,9-(1,2,3-trioxocine)-type steroid called rauianodoxy ( 133), and an ergosterol peroxide ( 33) were isolated from the Australian plant Rauia nodosa (family Rutaceae) [ 217]. An unusual endoperoxide called schinalactone A ( 134), which has a compressed ring A and shows anticancer activity against PANC-1 cell lines, was detected in the stems and roots of the magnolia vine, Schisandra sphenanthera [ 218].
